text: The Poacher Diaries is a split album released by the bands Agoraphobic Nosebleed and Converge in 1999. It was remastered by Scott Hull in 2006 and re-released by Relapse Records. == Track listing == ===Agoraphobic Nosebleed=== # "Mantis" – 1:26 # "Center of the Hive" – 1:13 # "Glass Tornado" – 1:02 # "Landfills of Extinct Possibility" – 1:11 # "Pentagram Constellation" – 2:18 # "Bed of Flies" – 1:01 # "Destroyed" – 1:07 # "Gringo" – 1:19 # "Infected Womb" – 2:59 ===Converge=== # * "Locust Reign" – 1:28 # "This Is Mine" – 1:34 # "They Stretch for Miles" – 4:26 # "My Great Devastator" – 5:00 # "The Human Shield" – 3:45 # "Minnesota" – 5:07 ==Personnel== ===Agoraphobic Nosebleed=== *J.R. Hayes – vocals *Scott Hull – guitar, drum programming *Jay Randall – vocals, electronics ===Converge=== *Kurt Ballou – guitar, vocals *Aaron Dalbec – guitar, vocals *John Digiorgio – drums *Nate Newton – bass guitar, vocals *Jacob Bannon – vocals ==References== Category:Agoraphobic Nosebleed albums Category:Converge (band) albums Category:Hardcore punk EPs Category:Grindcore EPs Category:1999 albums Category:Hydra Head Records albums Category:Split albums Category:Relapse Records albums Category:Albums produced by Kurt Ballou
title: The Poacher Diaries
